articles.title: Nvidia, Yum Brands to bring AI ordering to more Taco Bell drive-thru lanes - Axios
articles.description: The parent company of Taco Bell, KFC and Pizza Hut is teaming up with technology giant Nvidia in a move that could transform AI ordering.
articles.content:
Yum Brands the parent company of Taco Bell, KFC and Pizza Hut is teaming up with technology giant Nvidia in a move that could accelerate the adoption of AI ordering in drive-thrus.
